Docs.summary: The stage of the SRV record definition allowing to add or remove service record.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Fluent.DnsRecordSet.UpdateSrvRecordSet.IUpdateSrvRecordSet WithoutRecord (string target, int port, int priority, int weight);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Fluent.DnsRecordSet.UpdateSrvRecordSet.IUpdateSrvRecordSet WithoutRecord(string target, int32 port, int32 priority, int32 weight) cil managed

Docs.param: The canonical name of the target host running the service.
The port on which the service is bounded.
The priority of the target host.
The relative weight (preference) of the records.
Docs.summary: Removes a service record for a service.
Docs.return: The next stage of the record set update.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Fluent.DnsRecordSet.UpdateSrvRecordSet.IUpdateSrvRecordSet WithRecord (string target, int port, int priority, int weight);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Fluent.DnsRecordSet.UpdateSrvRecordSet.IUpdateSrvRecordSet WithRecord(string target, int32 port, int32 priority, int32 weight) cil managed

Docs.param: The canonical name of the target host running the service.
The port on which the service is bounded.
The priority of the target host, lower the value higher the priority.
The relative weight (preference) of the records with the same priority, higher the value more the preference.
Docs.summary: Specifies a service record for a service.
Docs.return: The next stage of the record set update.
